info.+content: The Slime Diaries: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
Tensura Nikki Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken
転スラ日記 転生したらスライムだった件
Rimuru gets hold of a diary and decided to write down the light hearted day to day happenings in his daily life as a slime with his companions, including having a festival and going to the beach.
#1: "Kamona Tempest!" by Miho Okasaki, Megumi Toyoguchi, Tomoaki Maeno, Sayaka Senbongi, M・A・O, Chikahiro Kobayashi, Asuna Tomari
アニメ 「転スラ日記」 | 「転生したらスライムだった件」ポータルサイト
